exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BombSkin" width="53" height="54" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bomb" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="number" font="number" text="9" verticalCenter="2" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
	<e:Image id="endCircle" source="circle" horizontalCenter="0" y="20" verticalCenter="0" x="20"/>
	<e:Group id="circleLayer" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Image source="circle" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="10" y="10"/>
		<e:Image source="circle" y="20" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="20" alpha="0.9" scaleX="1.5" scaleY="1.5"/>
		<e:Image source="circle" y="30" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="30" alpha="0.5" scaleX="2" scaleY="2"/>
		<e:Image source="circle" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" scaleX="2.5" scaleY="2.5" alpha="0.2"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameLayerSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bg1" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Group id="bestScoreGroup" height="44" width="120" x="241" y="54">
		<e:Image source="iconBest" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="best" right="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="bestScore" y="61" text="0" x="377" font="numberBest"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="labelScore" y="111" font="score" text="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="gameLayer" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" visible="false">
	</e:Group>
	<e:Button id="btnPause" x="516" y="38">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_pause_normal" source.down="btn_pause_press" pixelHitTest="true"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="addScoreLabel" y="425" text="0" font="score" x="122"/>
	<e:Group id="bombTipLayer" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" visible="false">
		<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0.53"/>
		<e:Image id="bombTip" source="bomb_tip" y="509" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="pauseLayer" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" visible="false">
		<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0.26" fillColor="0x000000"/>
		<e:Group id="menuLayer" height="254" width="354" horizontalCenter="0" y="417">
			<e:Button id="btnResume" horizontalCenter="0">
				<e:skinName>
					<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
						<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_resume_normal" source.down="btn_resume_press" pixelHitTest="true"/>
						<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
					</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:Button id="btnRestart" right="0" bottom="0">
				<e:skinName>
					<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
						<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_restart_normal" source.down="btn_restart_press" pixelHitTest="true"/>
						<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
					</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:Button id="btnHome" bottom="0">
				<e:skinName>
					<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
						<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_home_normal" source.down="btn_home_press" pixelHitTest="true"/>
						<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
					</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoadingSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0x161111"/>
	<e:Image source="ws_logo" y="244" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
	<e:Group height="21" width="500" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="34.5" visible="false">
		<e:Image id="loadingBar" source="ws_loading_bar" scale9Grid="11,2,311,17" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Image id="loadings" source="ws_loadings" scale9Grid="7,2,318,17" top="0" bottom="0" left="0" width="500"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="logos" source="ws_logos" y="800" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="StartSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="start_bg" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image y="292" source="title" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Button id="btnStart" y="512" horizontalCenter="0.5">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_start_normal" source.down="btn_start_press" pixelHitTest="true"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btnFollow" y="627" horizontalCenter="0.5">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_followus_normal" source.down="btn_followus_press" pixelHitTest="true"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="UploadSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect right="0" bottom="0" left="0" top="0" fillAlpha="0.36" x="10" y="10"/>

	<e:Group id="mainLayer" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Image id="bg" scale9Grid="34,34,409,604" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="0.5" height="389" width="573" source="ws_upload_bg"/>
		<e:Label id="tipLabel" width="498" size="35" horizontalCenter="0" textColor="0x636364" height="72" verticalAlign="middle" text="网络错误" textAlign="center" fontFamily="微软雅黑" y="459"/>
		<e:Image id="btnRetry" scale9Grid="28,4,303,52" width="518" y="590" source="ws_upload_btn" height="74" x="61"/>
		<e:Label id="labelBtn" text="重   试" y="607" bold="true" touchEnabled="false" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="40" x="263"/>
		<e:Label id="btnClose" text="X" x="561" y="339.5" textColor="0x66CD33" size="50" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
		<e:Label id="title" text="加载失败" y="339.5" textColor="0x66CD33" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="50" bold="true" x="220"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="loading" source="ws_upload_loading" anchorOffsetX="55" anchorOffsetY="55" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>
